statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_records
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Service'
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT maintenance_description, equipment_name FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency' AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Generator%' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-06-01' AND maintenance_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' OR maintenance_type = 'Corrective' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, technician_id FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE technician_id = 123;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM EquipmentMaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Excavator%';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_id = 5;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM EquipmentMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, maintenance_type, schedule_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE technician_id = 10 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 3 AND maintenance_type = 'Preventive' LIMIT 5;

SELECT equipment_name, schedule_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceRecords JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON EquipmentMaintenanceRecords.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT technician_name, technician_email FROM Technicians;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_name = 'Printer';
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceRecords.maintenance_type, Technicians.technician_name FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceRecords ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceRecords.equipment_id JOIN Technicians ON MaintenanceRecords.technician_name = Technicians.technician_name;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceRecords.maintenance_type FROM Equipment LEFT JOIN MaintenanceRecords ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceRecords.equipment_id WHERE MaintenanceRecords.maintenance_date IS NULL;

SELECT Technician_name, technician_email, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM Technicians JOIN MaintenanceRecords ON Technicians.technician_name = MaintenanceRecords.technician_name GROUP BY Technician_name, technician_email HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT m.record_id, m.maintenance_date, c.total_cost FROM maintenance_records m JOIN maintenance_cost c ON m.record_id = c.record_id WHERE c.total_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer';
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, service_description, total_cost FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id JOIN maintenance_cost ON maintenance_records.record_id = maintenance_cost.record_id WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_id = 101;
SELECT technician_name FROM Technicians WHERE technician_specialty = 'HVAC';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'L%';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT er.equipment_name, tr.technician_name FROM Equipment er INNER JOIN Technicians tr ON er.equipment_id = tr.technician_id;
SELECT mc.checklist_item FROM MaintenanceChecklist mc WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency Repair' ORDER BY checklist_id ASC;
